message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,000 for the product. Let me know if this is within your range.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. While I'm confident in the value of the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $9,500?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $9,000 for the product. This brings us closer to my maximum budget. I hope this meets your expectations.
